/usr/bin/c++   -pedantic -Wall -Wextra -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-unused-function  -fmessage-length=0 -fvisibility=hidden -Wall -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-unused-function -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/Billard.cc.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/BillardDDM.cc.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/Ball.cc.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/ColoredBall.cc.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/Display.cc.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/cmdline.c.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/getopt.c.o CMakeFiles/billard-nogui.dir/getopt1.c.o  -o billard-nogui -Wl,-rpath,/home/red-sea/COSSIM/hla/certi/build-certi/libRTI/hla-1_3:/home/red-sea/COSSIM/hla/certi/build-certi/libCERTI:/home/red-sea/COSSIM/hla/certi/build-certi/libHLA: ../libgraphc/libgraph-noguid.a ../../libRTI/hla-1_3/libRTI-NGd.so.1.0.0 ../../libRTI/hla-1_3/libFedTimed.so.1.0.0 ../../libCERTI/libCERTId.so.4.0.0 -lxml2 ../../libHLA/libHLAd.so.4.0.0 -lrt
